name: Impossible Drive Challenge 3D
description:
Drive your Jeep in the adventures tracks of the beautiful hills. Sit behind the wheels of the powerful vehicle and ride it on the beautiful tracks of the mountains. Drive on the challenging paths of the steep hills and enhance your skills. Do not fall off from the dangerous paths. Smooth and intuitive controls will give you the chance to increase skills. Fasten your seat belt tight, take the wheels and place your foot on the gas paddle, “Mountain jeep off road drive” will give you the chance to drive your luxurious jeep on the challenging roads of hills. Have you got enough skills that you can drive huge jeeps on the dangerous paths?

Your main goal is that you have to drive your jeep on the difficult routes and reach the finish line before the given time is over. You have to drive fast to reach the destination, so show your extreme driving skills and drive your Jeep. Ride your jeep with high speed to test your driving expertise. Different challenging and interesting missions are designed for you.

Complete all the missions with three stars to get the title of the professional driver. You will get cash after completing the level. Cash will unlock your favorite jeep and unlock more missions. If you do not reach the destination in time your mission will over and you have to start it again.

Features:
• Absolutely Free to play
• Multiple Beautiful Jeeps
• 3d Beautiful Mountain environment
• Easy and intuitive controls
• Stunning ultra HD graphics
• Realistic and effective sounds
